name: Space Hole 2020
description:
Photosensitivity Warning: This game features intense procedural visual effects. Space Hole 2020 features many unpredictable visual patterns and strobing lights.




  • Navigate mysterious cosmic structures on an allegorical journey through time
  • Witness procedural and discovered visual effects generated by overlapping unbuffered pixels
  • Configure dynamic visual effect bags with the Freeform Machine
  • Journey from the origin of reality to the furthest reaches of technological expansion
  • Non-linear design affords multiple viable paths through the game



Space Hole 2020 is a standalone continuation of the Space Hole games, and like 2016 and 2018 before it, can be experienced independently (the games share only mechanical themes).

Space Hole 2020 is a Sam Atlas game, Featuring music by DL Salo courtesy of Object Sonore. The game is named after the year 2020, but is neither a record of or a direct allegory for it, instead forming an existential perimeter around the year.
